 API API `access_token`.

## access_token

`access_token`

`access_token`2`access_token``access_token` API  [wx.request](https://developers.weixin.qq.com/miniprogram/dev/api/network/request/wx.request.html) `api.weixin.qq.com``getAccessToken``access_token`  API



## getAccessToken

 [-auth.getAccessToken](https://developers.weixin.qq.com/miniprogram/dev/api-backend/open-api/access-token/auth.getAccessToken.html)



#### 

```
GET https://api.weixin.qq.com/cgi-bin/token?grant_type=client_credential&appid=APPID&secret=APPSECRET
```



#### 

|        |    |  |  |                                                          |
| :--------: | :----: | :----: | :--: | ------------------------------------------------------------ |
| grant_type | string |        |    |  client_credential                                       |
|   appid    | string |        |    |  AppID[](https://mp.weixin.qq.com/) -  -  |
|   secret   | string |        |    |  AppSecret appid           |



#### 

Object  JSON 

|          |    |                                            |
| ------------ | ------ | ---------------------------------------------- |
| access_token | string |                                    |
| expires_in   | number | 7200 |
| errcode      | number |                                          |
| errmsg       | string |                                        |



#### 

- 

  ```json
  {"access_token": "ACCESS_TOKEN","expires_in":7200}
  ```

- 

  ```json
  {"errcode":40013,"errmsg":"invalid appid"}
  ```




#### access_token 

- `access_token` 512
- `access_token` 2 `access_token` 
-  `access_token` `access_token`  `access_token` 

#### 

 []([https://mp.weixin.qq.com/debug/cgi-bin/apiinfo?t=index&type=%E5%9F%BA%E7%A1%80%E6%94%AF%E6%8C%81&form=%E8%8E%B7%E5%8F%96access_token%E6%8E%A5%E5%8F%A3%20/token&token=&lang=zh_CN](https://mp.weixin.qq.com/debug/cgi-bin/apiinfo?t=index&type=&form=access_token /token&token=&lang=zh_CN)) 



## PHP access_token



![](https://i.loli.net/2019/08/31/A3ZD4S8flzortG2.png)

 PHP  `access_token`  `access_token` API





```php
function getAccessToken(){
    $appid="APPID";
    $appsecret = "APPSECRET";
    //
    $data=json_decode(get_php_file("access_token.php"));
    if($data->expire_time<time()){
        $url="https://api.weixin.qq.com/cgi-bin/token?grant_type=client_credential&appid=".$appid."&secret=".$appsecret;
        $res=json_decode(httpGet($url));
        $access_token=$res->access_token;
        if($access_token){
            $data->expire_time=time()+7000;
            $data->access_token=$access_token;
            set_php_file("access_token.php",json_encode($data));
        }
    }else{
      $access_token=$data->access_token;
    }
    return $access_token;
  }
```



 `access_token`  `access_token`

end

Post.title: Shadowsocks & Google BBR
Post._content:
> [](https://teddysun.com/486.html) # Shadowsocks ## CentOS 6+, Debian 7+, Ubuntu 12+ : >=128M : 2018 06 01 ## 1. Shadowsocks-Python ShadowsocksR Shadowsocks-Go Shadowsocks-libev 2. 3. 4. 5. #### Tips[Shadowsocks Troubleshooting](https://github.com/shadowsocks/shadowsocks/wiki/Troubleshooting) ## 9000-19999 teddysun.com Python libev aes-256-gcmR Go aes-256-cfb protocol origin ShadowsocksR obfs plain ShadowsocksR **** ## Windows: shadowsocks-win:[Github](https://github.com/shadowsocks/shadowsocks-windows/releases) MacOS: ShadowsocksX-NG:[Github](https://github.com/shadowsocks/ShadowsocksX-NG/releases) Linux: Shadowsocks-Qt5:[Github](https://github.com/shadowsocks/shadowsocks-qt5/wiki/Installation) ## root: ``` wget --no-check-certificate -O shadowsocks-all.sh https://raw.githubusercontent.com/teddysun/shadowsocks_install/master/shadowsocks-all.sh chmod +x shadowsocks-all.sh ./shadowsocks-all.sh 2>&1 | tee shadowsocks-all.log ``` ## : ``` Congratulations, your_shadowsocks_version install completed! Your Server IP :your_server_ip Your Server Port :your_server_port Your Password :your_password Your Encryption Method:your_encryption_method Your QR Code: (For Shadowsocks Windows, OSX, Android and iOS clients) ss://your_encryption_method:your_password@your_server_ip:your_server_port Your QR Code has been saved as a PNG file path: your_path.png Welcome to visit:https://teddysun.com/486.html Enjoy it! ``` ## root ``` ./shadowsocks-all.sh uninstall ``` ## Shadowsocks-Python `/etc/init.d/shadowsocks-python start | stop | restart | status` ShadowsocksR `/etc/init.d/shadowsocks-r start | stop | restart | status` Shadowsocks-Go `/etc/init.d/shadowsocks-go start | stop | restart | status` Shadowsocks-libev `/etc/init.d/shadowsocks-libev start | stop | restart | status` ## Shadowsocks-Python `/etc/shadowsocks-python/config.json` ShadowsocksR `/etc/shadowsocks-r/config.json` Shadowsocks-Go `/etc/shadowsocks-go/config.json` Shadowsocks-libev `/etc/shadowsocks-libev/config.json`
---- # Google BBR
Google TCP BBR Linux 4.9 Linux Google TCP BBR ## CentOS 6+Debian 7+Ubuntu 12+ OpenVZ KVMXenVMware 128M 2018 06 09 ## 1. **Vultr** VPS 2. VPS OpenVZ 3. VPS VNC, grub , 4. ## root ``` wget --no-check-certificate https://github.com/teddysun/across/raw/master/bbr.sh && chmod +x bbr.sh && ./bbr.sh ``` VPS y VPS TCP BBR ``` uname -r ``` OK ``` sysctl net.ipv4.tcp_available_congestion_control ``` net.ipv4.tcp_available_congestion_control = bbr cubic reno net.ipv4.tcp_available_congestion_control = reno cubic bbr ``` sysctl net.ipv4.tcp_congestion_control ``` net.ipv4.tcp_congestion_control = bbr ``` sysctl net.core.default_qdisc ``` net.core.default_qdisc = fq ``` lsmod | grep bbr ``` tcp_bbr bbr ** VPS ** ## [https://github.com/google/bbr/blob/master/Documentation/bbr-quick-start.md](https://github.com/google/bbr/blob/master/Documentation/bbr-quick-start.md) [http://kernel.ubuntu.com/~kernel-ppa/mainline/](http://kernel.ubuntu.com/~kernel-ppa/mainline/)
